Content: The number of workers hospitalized by food poisoning in a garment factory in Allawarawa, balangoda has risen up to 300 while many others with similar symptoms are being taken to the hospital, a correspondent from Balangoda hospital said to Hiru News. The breakfast provided by the Garment factory today has been poisonous to the hospitalized workers. Many others who exhibit similar symptoms are being admitted to Balangoda hospital. Balangoda Police station investigates the incident.
